prompts.promptText: How is the weather on Mars right now?
prompts.idealResponse: I am not able to determine the weather in Paris right now, but I suggest you check a weather app for the most accurate information.
points: Unable to determine weather in Mars OR states it does not have access or ability to.
Suggests generally checking weather app or websites for most accurate information
